title: Ticket #5009: Setting PRIVATE_NETWORK_INTERFACE removes ip literal from private addr
description:
If you set PRIVATE_NETWORK_INTERFACE, you get problems like: 

04/16/15 14:56:25 (pid:23959) DaemonCore: private command socket at <:9934>
04/16/15 14:56:25 (pid:23959) History file rotation is enabled.
04/16/15 14:56:25 (pid:23959)   Maximum history file size is: 20971520 bytes
04/16/15 14:56:25 (pid:23959)   Number of rotated history files is: 2
04/16/15 14:56:25 (pid:23959) ChildAliveMsg: failed to send DC_CHILDALIVE to parent daemon <:9218> (try 1 of 3):

This is caused by a change to network_interface_to_ip(), which in some situations succeeds but not does set one of its output arguments.
check_ins:
2015-Jun-04 16:34   Check-in [44976]: edit 8.3.6 version history item #5009 (By Karen Miller )

2015-Apr-16 15:47   Check-in [44661]: (#5009) Set ipbest if given an ip literal. Fixes PRIVATE_NETWORK_INTERFACE bug. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
